description:
Ghostrunner is a hardcore FPP game packed with lightning-fast action, set in a grim, cyberpunk megastructure. Climb Dharma Tower, humanityâ€™s last shelter, after a world-ending cataclysm. Make your way up from the bottom to the top, confront the tyrannical Keymaster, and take your revenge.

Winter Pack: This pack will increase your cosmetic inventory. The holiday customized gloves and sword will give you a totally different perspective for the game. 
Purchase this Winter Pack and receive the following content:
- 1x Cold Snap Katana
- 1x Cold Blood Gloves
name: Ghostrunner: Winter Pack
